column4: now i tried to reinstall my nvidia driver tree times. in synaptic, with 'apt-get --purge remove nvidia*; sudo apt-get --purge autoremove; sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg' command and with envyng. Neither fix my problem. A week ago or two i tried to install a driver manually guded by a tutorial on net. I have forgotten where i found it and i dont remember the driver version i installed. The system works ok but no matter what i do i
cant get desktop effects nor compiz working. I really want to resolve this. Any one hardcore graphic driver professionals here to help? :)
There is a simple script i Know of that checks for compiz compatability and then tells you waht to do
